title: Using social media to quantify spatial and temporal dynamics ...
summary: This post discusses the use of social media and survey data to quantify spatial and temporal dynamics in nature recreation. It highlights the limitations of survey data and compares it with social media data for temporal comparison.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because the post discusses "spatial and temporal dynamics" and "survey data", which are directly relevant to "Spatio Temporal" and "Survey data". While it doesn't mention point processes, the other keywords are well covered.
